mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM car_biz_car_info car WHERE status!=2 and license_plates = #{licensePlates}

SELECT c.license_plates AS licensePlates, c.city_id AS cityId, c.supplier_id AS supplierId, c.driver_id AS driverId, c.car_purchase_date AS carPurchaseDate, c.color AS color, c.model_detail AS modelDetail, m.model_id AS carModelId, m.model_name AS carModelName, city.city_name AS cityName, supplier.supplier_full_name AS supplierName FROM car_biz_car_info c LEFT JOIN car_biz_model m ON c.car_model_id = m.model_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_city city ON city.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_supplier supplier ON supplier.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE c.license_plates = #{licensePlates} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE car_biz_car_info SET driver_id = #{driverId}, update_date = now() WHERE license_plates = #{licensePlates}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.license_plates AS licensePlates, c.city_id AS cityId, c.supplier_id AS supplierId, c.driver_id AS driverId, c.car_purchase_date AS carPurchaseDate, c.color AS color, c.model_detail AS modelDetail FROM car_biz_car_info c WHERE c.license_plates IN
#{item}

SELECT c.license_plates AS licensePlates, c.city_id AS cityId, city.city_name AS cityName, c.supplier_id AS supplierId, supplier.supplier_full_name AS supplierName FROM car_biz_car_info c LEFT JOIN car_biz_city city ON city.city_id = c.city_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_supplier supplier ON supplier.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE c.car_id = #{carId} LIMIT 1

SELECT info.license_plates licensePlates, city.city_id cityId, city.city_name cityName, sup.supplier_id supplierId, sup.dispatcher_phone dispatcherPhone, gop.group_id groupId, gop.group_name groupName, info.car_id carId FROM car_biz_car_info info LEFT JOIN car_biz_model model ON info.car_model_id = model.model_id left join car_biz_car_group gop on model.group_id = gop.group_id left join car_biz_supplier sup on info.supplier_id = sup.supplier_id left join car_biz_city city on info.city_id = city.city_id where info.car_id = #{carId}
